item.title: Citi Names New Singapore Country Head
item.description: Citigroup Inc. appointed Lee Lung Nien as country officer and banking head for Singapore, taking over from Tibor Pandi who’s been in the role for two years.

item.title: Citi CEO Sees More Dealmaking With US Recession Unlikely
item.description: Citigroup Inc.’s chief executive officer said merger activity is rebounding as US companies gain confidence from clearer policy signals, with a recession in the world’s largest economy looking unlikel

item.title: Citi Strategists Raise S&P 500 Target on Resilient Earnings
item.description: Strategists at Citigroup Inc. raised their target for the S&P 500 Index, saying tax cuts should offset the negative impact from tariffs on US companies.

item.title: Citigroup Hires Guillermo Baygual From Rival JPMorgan as Co-Head of M&A
item.description: Citigroup Inc. has appointed JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Guillermo Baygual as co-head of mergers and acquisitions in what is just the latest in a string of high-profile investment banking hires from it

item.title: Citi CEO Meets Trump on Fannie, Freddie Public Offerings
item.description: Citigroup Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser met with President Donald Trump on Wednesday to pitch public stock offerings for mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.

item.title: Citi Lifts Gold Short-Term Outlook on Growth Concerns
item.description: Citigroup Inc. revised its forecast for gold, with analysts now predicting bullion will rally to a record high in the near term due to a worsening US economy and inflation-boosting tariffs.

item.title: Citi Lifts Gold Short-Term Outlook on Growth Concerns
item.description: Citigroup Inc. revised its forecast for gold, with analysts now predicting bullion will rally to a record high in the near term due to a worsening US economy and inflation-boosting tariffs.

item.title: Citigroup Fixed-Income, Stock Trading Revenue Soar in 2Q
item.description: Citigroup Inc.’s traders had their best second quarter in five years with revenue buoyed by record trading volumes in the quarter. Sonali Basak reports on Bloomberg Television.

item.title: Citigroup Fixed-Income, Stock Trading Revenue Soar in 2Q
